title: Calculate Dog Years to Human Years

data.title: Calculate Dog Years to Human Years
data.statement:
How to Calculate Dog Years to Human Years:
• 15 human years equals the first year of a dog’s life
• Year two for a dog equals about nine years for a human
• And after that, each human year would be approximately five years for a dog

Given the dog's age in years and/or months, what does that translate to in human years?
(Round to nearest year)



Source:
https://www.akc.org/expert-advice/health/how-to-calculate-dog-years-to-human-years/

testCases.title: Very long name - Test 3
testCases.testIn: Penelope Petunia Peachtree is 8 years 2 months
testCases.testOut: Penelope Petunia Peachtree is like a 55-year-old-person

testCases.title: Validator 3
testCases.testIn: Rainbow Sparkle Cotton Candy is 17 years 10 months
testCases.testOut: Rainbow Sparkle Cotton Candy is like a 103-year-old-person

testCases.title: Stress Test Your Parsing 1 - Test 6
testCases.testIn: Maestro Monthly Macyear is 17 years 8 months
testCases.testOut: Maestro Monthly Macyear is like a 102-year-old-person

testCases.title: Validator 11
testCases.testOut: Angus Von Wigglebottom is like a 119-year-old-person

testCases.title: Test 12
testCases.testOut: Little Bow Wow is like a 14-year-old-person

testCases.title: Validator 14
testCases.testIn: Pippa the Gangster Step Sister is 4 years 7 months
testCases.testOut: Pippa the Gangster Step Sister is like a 37-year-old-person

data.constraints:
[[dogName]] may be more than one word

[[ageInFullYears]], [[additionalMonths]], [[convertedAge]] > 0
data.inputDescription:
<<Line 1:>> A string, a statement about a dog's age, in the format of 
[[dogName]] {{is}} [[ageInFullYears]] {{year}} or {{years}} [[additionalMonths]] {{month}} or {{months}}
(If [[ageInFullYears]] or [[additionalMonths]] is 0, then that will not be part of the statement)

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

How to Calculate Dog Years to Human Years:
• 15 human years equals the first year of a dog’s life
• Year two for a dog equals about nine years for a human
• And after that, each human year would be approximately five years for a dog

Given the dog's age in years and/or months, what does that translate to in human years?
(Round to nearest year)



Source:
https://www.akc.org/expert-advice/health/how-to-calculate-dog-years-to-human-years/
Input
Line 1: A string, a statement about a dog's age, in the format of
dogName is ageInFullYears year or years additionalMonths month or months
(If ageInFullYears or additionalMonths is 0, then that will not be part of the statement)
Output
dogName is like a convertedAge-year-old-person
Constraints
dogName may be more than one word

ageInFullYears, additionalMonths, convertedAge > 0
Example
Input
Sassy is 4 years 10 months
Output
Sassy is like a 38-year-old-person
